        public Vertex getVertex(Direction direction)

      • getVertex

        public Vertex getVertex(Direction direction,
               int label)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method returns the tail/out or head/in vertex satisfying the given label. Throws IllegalArgumentException if BOTH is provided in Direction
        Parameters:
        direction - - tail/out or head/in vertex.
        label - - the type of vertex to return
        Returns:
        - returns the tail/out or head/in vertex of the type Label.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
